game_description: Welcome to Pirate Island adventurer! Here, you will embark on a journey to an island were great treasures await those who are brave and cunning enough to find them. Discover and follow the clues to complete your treasure map, and use it to reveal and claim the treasure! May your path be filled with riches and glory!
review_1: after i played this i got bored and decided to play rec room. whilst playing rec room i was chopped in the throat by a naruto wannabe
review_2: I loved the theme and music and it was good to explore controller of VR in a simple way and with basic gameplay. Do not expect a full game but totally worth the explore scene. Best wishes
